trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"> </xref> hendelse av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting> event, you can perform any additional preprocessing required or cancel the database query entirely.
trans-unit.target: Ved å legge til en hendelse behandlingsprogrammet representant til å håndtere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>hendelse, kan du utføre en ekstra forhåndsbehandling kreves eller avbryte databasespørringen helt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Because the SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> class, you can cancel a pending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Fordi SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs klassen hentes fra det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>klasse, du kan avbryte en ventende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>databasespørringen ved å angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can examine and manipulate the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> collection, and other database query properties prior to running the query by accessing the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan se og endre den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A>samlingen og andre egenskaper for database spørringen før du kjører spørringen ved å åpne den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objektet vises av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method by accessing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også undersøke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objekt som er sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>metoden ved å åpne den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method to provide access to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query before it is run.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs brukes i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>metode for å gi tilgang til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>databasespørringen før den kjører.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying data objects during the course of a data operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen viser mange hendelser som kan håndtere, for å fungere med underliggende dataobjekter i løpet av en Dataoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelsene og tilknyttede <xref:System.EventArgs>klasser og hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet representanter.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | EventArgs kan | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før data som hentes. | SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før en insert-, update eller delete-operasjonen utføres. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the data retrieval, insert, update, or delete operation completes.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Inntreffer etter datahenting, insert, update eller delete-operasjonen er fullført. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> class, using the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object and any <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"> </xref> class, ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objektet, og eventuelle <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The `inputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: Den `inputParameters` parameteren er en <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>samling navn/verdi-par som samsvarer med de som finnes i Metodesignaturen og sendes som referanse.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object that represents the cancelable <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> query.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objektet som representerer den kan annulleres <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>spørringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objekt sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objekt sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: You can examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object to determine whether sorting, paging, or a row count are requested as part of the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan se den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objekt for å finne ut om sortering, bla, eller en radantallet forespørres som en del av henting Dataoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class to request that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> perform additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: Databundet Kontroller bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>klassen for å be om at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>utføre flere data relatert operasjoner i et resultatsett, for eksempel sortere dataene, eller returnerer et bestemt delsett med data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Disse dataene relatert operasjonene listes opp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>opplisting.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object is specified during <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> creation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objektet eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objekt er angitt under <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"> </xref> oppretting.
